text: Impromptu is a 1991 British American French biographical comedy movie directed by first time director James Lapine. It stars Hugh Grant, Judy Davis, Mandy Patinkin, Bernadette Peters, Julian Sands, Ralph Brown, Emma Thompson, Anton Rodgers, Lucy Speed, John Savident, Anna Massey, Elizabeth Spriggs and Edward Highmore. It was distributed by Rank Film Distributors. ==Other websites== * * Category:1991 comedy movies Category:1990s biographical movies Category:British biographical movies Category:British comedy movies Category:American biographical movies Category:American comedy movies Category:French biographical movies Category:French comedy movies Category:Movies about classical music and musicians Category:Movies set in the 1830s Category:Movies set in France
title: Impromptu (1991 movie)
